code: d(   x,   i,   j,   by,   keyby,   with = TRUE,   nomatch = getOption("datatable.nomatch", NA),   mult = "all",   roll = FALSE,   rollends = if (roll == "nearest") c(TRUE, TRUE) else if (roll >= 0) c(FALSE, TRUE) else     c(TRUE, FALSE),   which = FALSE,   .SDcols,   verbose = getOption("datatable.verbose"),   allow.cartesian = getOption("datatable.allow.cartesian"),   drop = NULL,   on = NULL )
